resources.string:
install django pip install django==version
start a project django-admin startproject name .
start a server python manage.py runserver
to start an app python manage.py startapp name NOTE - register your app in the settings module
to make migrations to the database through models python manage.py makemigrations and to migrate python manage.py migrate NOTE - dont forget to register your model class in admin
to create superuser python manage.py createsuperuser
